item.description:
I thought a cozy cafe with hot beverages would be a nice setting for our December meetup, so we'll meet this time at Tazzo on Westminster Street. The group has grown over the past few weeks and it would be great to get everyone gathered together for an afternoon of tech-talk. If we get a good number of RSVPs then perhaps I'll put together a more formal agenda, but otherwise plan on the usual open format.

Hope to see you all there. And if not, Happy Holidays!

~ Chris

group.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour Meetup Group

item.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour December Meetup
